quoteText:
The use of our Services imply your approval of the present terms.
We reserve the right to modify the terms at any time so they can fit the evolutions of the services of QWANT and/or their operation.
title: critical changes without user involvement

tosdr.case: The service makes critical changes to its terms without user involvement
tosdr.tldr: "We reserve the right to modify the terms at any time so they can fit the evolutions of the services of QWANT and/or their operation.  You will be informed, by email and/or by any other appropriate means on the affected Services, of all substantial changes to the Terms, prior to their entry into force."
